act:
1355663 THE TWO- MEMBER CONSTITUENCIES (ABOLITION) AND OTHER LAWS REPEAL ACT, 2001
ACT NO. 47 OF 2001 [ 14th September, 2001.]
An Act to repeal the Two- Member Constituencies (Abolition) Act, 1961 and certain other enactments.
BE it enacted by Parliament in the Fifty- second Year of the Republic of India as follows:-
962853 1Short title.- This Act may be called the Two- Member Constituencies (Abolition) and other Laws Repeal Act, 2001.
70356 2Repeal of enactments.- The enactments specified in the Schedule are hereby repealed. SUBHASH C. JAIN, Secy. to the Govt. of India.
